{"step_by_step_thinking": "Insufficient closure of the flasks during packing of denture base resin can result in a decrease in vertical dimension. When the flasks are not properly closed, there may be a lack of pressure on the resin, leading to inadequate compression and polymerization. This can cause the denture base to shrink and result in a decrease in the vertical dimension of the denture.", "answer_choice": "D"}
